resources.string:
Open your facebook account on your personal computer.
Go to this link 
http://on.fb.me/1dTEf8n or
http://is.gd/codegen 
and setup code generator.
Use the secret key from facebook to Add Secret in the Code Generator app.

Code Generator is a time based code generation app for faceboook. It creates a unique login code every 30 seconds, even when you aren\'t connected to the internet, so you always have a code when you need one. If you have login approvals turned on, you can use Code Generator instead of waiting for a text message with your login code.
Coded with love at \nCodemonkey Labs \nby Tushar Roy
